column4: Right, I realize I'll have to manually upgrade. But on 9.10 in the update manager it says 10.04 at the top. will that change to 10.10 when it is released so I can upgrade to 10.10 or do i have to go up to the semi-broken 10.04
you won't be able to upgrade directly from 9.10 to 10.10
maybe a fresh install would be the bestsolution
